name: HF Sinclair Corporation
summary: HF Sinclair Corporation is a publicly traded energy company specializing in the production and marketing of light products such as gasoline, diesel fuel, jet fuel, renewable diesel, and other specialty products. The company owns and operates refineries primarily in Kansas, Oklahoma, New Mexico, Wyoming, Washington, and Utah, and is headquartered in Dallas, Texas. Formerly known as HollyFrontier Corporation, HF Sinclair is a significant player in the U.S. oil refining and marketing sector.
